long_description: A natural alternative to synthetic fabrics, the men's Icebreaker Sonic T-Shirt keeps you comfortable during the run with a high-performance, moisture-wicking blend of merino wool and spandex. Lightweight merino wool with spandex jersey fabric offers high performance with light stretch a smooth surface. Fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly; merino wool resists odors naturally. Fabric also provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Mesh underarm and back panels ventilate to enhance comfort. Stash pocket at hem stores small items. Reflective logo; dropped hem; machine washable. The Icebreaker Sonic T-Shirt for men offers a slim fit.
short_description: A natural alternative to synthetic fabrics, the men's Icebreaker Sonic T-Shirt keeps you comfortable during the run with a high-performance, moisture-wicking blend of merino wool and spandex.
